Unit Test Report: Get-UT_TemplateObject
=======================================

      #    Scenario                              Fails (of 4)  Status

      2    Base case, but non-default delimiter  0             SUCCESS

      4    No output group                       0             SUCCESS
      5    Many input groups - 20                0             SUCCESS
      6    Many output groups - 20               0             SUCCESS
      7    Many input fields - 100               0             SUCCESS
      8    Many output fields - 100              0             SUCCESS
      9    Large group names - 100ch             0             SUCCESS
      10   Large field names - 100ch             0             SUCCESS

Test scenarios: 0 failed of 10: SUCCESS

SCENARIO 8: Many output fields - 100 {
======================================

   INPUTS
   ======

      GROUP 1: Scalars: Empty
      =======================

      GROUP 2: Input Group {
      ======================

            #  Group Name     Field Name     
            -  -------------  ---------------

SCENARIO 9: Large group names - 100ch {
=======================================

   INPUTS
   ======

      GROUP 1: Scalars: Empty
      =======================

      GROUP 2: Input Group {
      ======================

            #  Group Name                                                                                            Field Name     
            -  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ---------------
            1  Input Group 1.......12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890  Input Field 1-1
            2  Input Group 1.......12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890  Input Field 1-2
            3  Input Group 2                                                                                         Input Field 2-1

      }
      =

      GROUP 3: Output Group {
      =======================

            #  Group Name                                                                                            Field Name      
            -  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ----------------
            1  Output Group 1......12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890  Output Field 1-1
            2  Output Group 2                                                                                        Output Field 2-1
            3  Output Group 2                                                                                        Output Field 2-2

      }
      =

   OUTPUTS
   =======

      GROUP 1: Meta Input Group {
      ===========================

            #  Group Name                                                                                            Field Name     
            -  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ---------------
            1  Input Group 1.......12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890  Input Field 1-1
            2  Input Group 1.......12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890  Input Field 1-2
            3  Input Group 2                                                                                         Input Field 2-1

      } 0 failed of 3: SUCCESS
      ========================

      GROUP 2: Meta Output Group {
      ============================

            #  Group Name                                                                                            Field Name      
            -  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ----------------
            1  Output Group 1......12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890  Output Field 1-1
            2  Output Group 2                                                                                        Output Field 2-1
            3  Output Group 2                                                                                        Output Field 2-2

      } 0 failed of 3: SUCCESS
      ========================

      ===============================
